about_the_game:
Turbocharge Nickelodeon Kart Racers 3: Slime Speedway with this Turbo Pack that adds two exclusive characters: Zuko, the fiery prince of the Fire Nation and classic, throwback version of the red donned Raphael, alongside more Crew, Kart Parts and Paint Jobs!

This Pack Includes:
• Zuko from Avatar: The Last Airbender as a playable racer
• Eastman and Laird Raphael from Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles as a playable racer
• Firelord Ozai from Avatar: The Last Airbender as crew member
• Shredder from Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles as a crew member
• Slime style Exhaust Kart Part
• Slime style Monster Wheel Kart Part
• Orange and Purple Kid's Choice Awards Paint Jobs

Zuko, Raphael and the content contained in this pack are also included in the Nickelodeon Kart Racers 3: Slime Speedway Turbo Edition (sold separately).
In order to use this content, you will need Nickelodeon Kart Racers 3: Slime Speedway (sold separately).

Turbocharge Nickelodeon Kart Racers 3: Slime Speedway with this Turbo Pack that adds two exclusive characters: Zuko, the fiery prince of the Fire Nation and classic, throwback version of the red donned Raphael, alongside more Crew, Kart Parts and Paint Jobs!

This Pack Includes:

• Shredder from Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles as a crew member

• Orange and Purple Kid's Choice Awards Paint Jobs

Zuko, Raphael and the content contained in this pack are also included in the Nickelodeon Kart Racers 3: Slime Speedway Turbo Edition (sold separately).
In order to use this content, you will need Nickelodeon Kart Racers 3: Slime Speedway (sold separately).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.7 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1050 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.9 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6 GB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: Turbocharge Nickelodeon Kart Racers 3: Slime Speedway with this Turbo Pack to unlock Zuko, the fiery prince of the Fire Nation and classic, throwback version of the red donned Raphael as playable and more Crew, Kart Parts and Paint Jobs!
